birth_place.zh-cn: 东京府东京市麹町区宫城产殿
birth_place.en: Miyagi Sanden, Kōjimachi, Tokyo City, Tokyo Prefecture

description.zh-cn: 日本第125代天皇，年号为“平成”。1989年1月7日即位，2019年4月30日生前退位为上皇。他也是一位鱼类学者，专门研究𫚥虎亚目。
description.en: The 125th Emperor of Japan, whose reign name was 'Heisei'. He ascended the throne on January 7, 1989, and abdicated as Emperor Emeritus on April 30, 2019. He is also an ichthyologist specializing in the Gobiiformes suborder.

description.zh-cn: 日本第124代天皇，大正天皇之子，明仁的父亲。
description.en: The 124th Emperor of Japan, son of Emperor Taishō, and father of Akihito.

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇的皇后，明仁的母亲。
description.en: Empress consort of Emperor Shōwa and mother of Akihito.

description.zh-cn: 明仁的皇后，现为上皇后，是日清制粉会长正田英三郎的长女。
description.en: The wife of Akihito, currently Empress Emerita. She is the eldest daughter of Hidesaburō Shōda, former chairman of Nisshin Flour Milling Inc.

description.zh-cn: 日本第126代天皇，明仁的长子。
description.en: The 126th Emperor of Japan, the elder son of Akihito.

description.zh-cn: 日本皇嗣，明仁的次子。
description.en: The Crown Prince of Japan, the younger son of Akihito.

description.zh-cn: 明仁的女儿，婚后脱离皇室身份。
description.en: The daughter of Akihito, who left the Imperial Household upon her marriage.

description.zh-cn: 日本企业家，曾任日清制粉集团本社会长，是美智子上皇后的父亲。
description.en: Japanese businessman, former chairman of Nisshin Flour Milling Inc., and the father of Empress Emerita Michiko.

description.zh-cn: 美国儿童文学家，贵格派教徒，曾于1946年至1950年担任明仁的家庭教师。
description.en: An American children's literature author and Quaker who served as a tutor to Akihito from 1946 to 1950.

description.zh-cn: 美国军事家，曾任驻日盟军总司令。
description.en: American military leader who served as the Supreme Commander for the Allied Powers in Japan.

description.zh-cn: 琉球独立运动人士，在1975年姬百合之塔事件中试图刺杀时为皇太子的明仁。
description.en: A Ryukyuan independence activist who attempted to assassinate Crown Prince Akihito in the 1975 Himeyuri Tower incident.

description.zh-cn: 1975年，时为皇太子的明仁访问冲绳时，琉球独立运动人士向其投掷燃烧瓶的事件。
description.en: An incident in 1975 where Ryukyuan independence activists threw a Molotov cocktail at then-Crown Prince Akihito during his visit to Okinawa.

description.zh-cn: 明仁天皇在位期间使用的日本年号。
description.en: The era name of Japan used during Emperor Akihito's reign.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记和中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任第44任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician who served as the 44th President of the United States.

nodes.id: 天皇退位等相关皇室典范特例法

zh-cn: 天皇退位等相关皇室典范特例法

description.zh-cn: 为实现明仁天皇生前退位而制定的特别法。
description.en: A special law enacted to allow for the abdication of Emperor Akihito.

description.zh-cn: 明仁是昭和天皇的长子。
description.en: Akihito is the eldest son of Emperor Shōwa.

description.zh-cn: 明仁是香淳皇后的长子。
description.en: Akihito is the eldest son of Empress Kōjun.

description.zh-cn: 美智子是日清制粉会长正田英三郎的长女。
description.en: Michiko is the eldest daughter of Hidesaburō Shōda, chairman of Nisshin Flour Milling Inc.

description.zh-cn: 明仁于1959年4月10日与正田美智子结婚。
description.en: Akihito married Michiko Shōda on April 10, 1959.

description.zh-cn: 德仁是明仁的长子。
description.en: Naruhito is the eldest son of Akihito.

description.zh-cn: 文仁亲王是明仁的次子。
description.en: Prince Fumihito is the second son of Akihito.

description.zh-cn: 黑田清子是明仁的女儿。
description.en: Sayako Kuroda is the daughter of Akihito.

description.zh-cn: 明仁曾在学习院大学政治经济学系学习。
description.en: Akihito studied at the Department of Politics and Economics of Gakushuin University.

description.zh-cn: 伊莉莎白·格雷·维宁曾担任明仁的家庭教师。
description.en: Elizabeth Gray Vining served as a private tutor to Akihito.

description.zh-cn: 明仁经由其家庭教师伊莉莎白·格雷·维宁的介绍与驻日盟军总司令麦克阿瑟见面。
description.en: Akihito met with Douglas MacArthur, the Supreme Commander for the Allied Powers, through an introduction by his tutor, Elizabeth Gray Vining.

description.zh-cn: 在姬百合之塔事件中，川野纯治向时为皇太子的明仁夫妇投掷燃烧瓶，试图行刺。
description.en: During the Himeyuri Tower incident, Junji Kawano threw a Molotov cocktail at then-Crown Prince Akihito and his wife in an assassination attempt.

description.zh-cn: 1975年7月17日，明仁夫妇以皇太子和太子妃身份访问冲绳时，遭遇燃烧瓶袭击事件。
description.en: On July 17, 1975, while visiting Okinawa as Crown Prince and Princess, Akihito and his wife were attacked with a Molotov cocktail.

description.zh-cn: 东日本大震灾发生后，促使明仁于2011年3月16日发表了历史上天皇首次于大灾难后发表的全国电视演说，以鼓励国民。
description.en: Following the Great East Japan Earthquake, Akihito was prompted to deliver a nationwide televised address on March 16, 2011, to encourage the public, the first such address by an emperor after a major disaster.

description.zh-cn: 平成是明仁在位期间使用的年号。
description.en: Heisei was the era name used during Akihito's reign.

description.zh-cn: 1992年10月，明仁天皇访华期间，与时任中共中央总书记江泽民会见。
description.en: In October 1992, during his visit to China, Emperor Akihito met with then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国国家主席杨尚昆邀请明仁天皇伉俪访问中国。
description.en: Then-President of China Yang Shangkun invited Emperor Akihito and his wife to visit China.

description.zh-cn: 2014年4月24日，明仁与美国总统贝拉克·奥巴马会面。
description.en: On April 24, 2014, Akihito met with U.S. President Barack Obama.

description.zh-cn: 明仁于1933年12月23日在宫城（现皇居）内的御产殿诞生。
description.en: Akihito was born on December 23, 1933, in the Gosan-den (delivery hall) within the Kyūjō (present-day Imperial Palace).

relationships.target: 天皇退位等相关皇室典范特例法

description.zh-cn: 明仁于2016年8月8日正式表达在世退位的意向，推动了《天皇退位特例法》的制定。
description.en: On August 8, 2016, Akihito formally expressed his intention to abdicate, which pushed for the enactment of the 'Special Measures Law on the Emperor's Abdication'.

description.zh-cn: 德仁是明仁的长子和皇位继承人，在其父于2019年4月30日退位后，于次日即位为天皇。
description.en: Naruhito, the eldest son and heir of Akihito, ascended to the throne as Emperor on the day after his father's abdication on April 30, 2019.

position.zh-cn: 皇太子, 天皇, 上皇

description.zh-cn: 明仁自出生起即为日本皇室成员。
description.en: Akihito has been a member of the Imperial House of Japan since his birth.
